translation.en: - There's something dangerous
about the boredom of teenage girls.
translation.es: en el aburrimiento de las adolescentes.

translation.en: Coach said that once.
But she said it not like a mom
translation.es: Pero no lo dijo como madre

translation.en: or a teacher or a guidance counselor.
translation.es: ni como maestra o consejera estudiantil.

translation.en: She said it like she knew
and understood.
Coach saw something in us--
translation.es: La entrenadora vio algo en nosotras,

translation.en: something quivering and real.
She saw past the glitter and the hair and the attitude...
translation.es: Vio más allá del brillo, el cabello y la actitud.

translation.en: To everything beneath. All our miseries.
translation.es: Vio lo que hay debajo, todas nuestras miserias.

translation.en: Most of all,
she could see that we were waiting...
Had always been waiting...
for her.
It was fucking beautiful.
Until it went too far.
- You like the ones with the tapered tip, right, babe?
- Yeah.
I can make you all remember me
Little baby me
- If you all got some game on, your star QB wouldn't be shipping off to basic.

translation.en: - The recruiters don't lie.
It's one way out of Sutton Grove. - Yeah, and come back in a body bag.
translation.es: - Es una salida de Sutton Grove. - Para volver muerto.

translation.en: - Sounds like Sarge Will's been giving you the full- on hustle, huh?
translation.es: Parece que el sargento Will te convenció.

translation.en: - He's not a bad dude.
- How hard do you think it would be?
Sarge Will?
You're not climbing that tree.
translation.es: No te vas a subir a ese árbol.

translation.en: - Wanna make it interesting?
- No chance. -
- I gotta keep my money.
You pulling a shift tonight, Slocum?
- Gotta fill that cup. You?
- Blow it off.
Come on. We'll practice.

translation.en: - Well, go on. Show 'em the back tuck.

translation.en: - Nice! -
- Thank you.
- You're getting better.
Who the fuck cares?
- Does it look like I care?
I just don't wanna flame out before regionals.

translation.en: That's all. - What? And the new coach is gonna get us there?

translation.en: Colette French?
Sounds like a porn star.
Classy one, though. She won't do anal.

translation.es: ¿Una nueva entrenadora cree que puede venir a dirigir mi equipo?

translation.en: And as if she's hot. She's ancient.
translation.es: Ni que fuera sexi. Es una vieja.

translation.en: She's, like, 28.
I would like to see some 28- year- old ass do this.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on.
You ready?
- Up. Up!
- Move!
You can bend those knees for ballers.
translation.es: Si pueden correr a los jugadores, pueden correr para mí.

translation.en: You can bend them for me.
translation.es: Si pueden correr a los jugadores, pueden correr para mí. Así no vas a mantener esos muslos, Hanlon.

Move it.
Go! Move!
- I think that's her.
Coming in like an OG.
I better tell Cap'n Beth.
Kicks.
V- sits.
Plank.
That's enough. Line up.
First game is next Friday.

Spray tans.
Gummy- bear thighs.
Backyard tumblers.
But I don't see a squad.
And I do not see my top girl.

translation.en: - Beth's top girl. She's always-- - On my squads, you earn your spot.
translation.es: - Beth es la estrella. - El lugar hay que ganárselo.

That's how you get to regionals, become champions,

translation.es: y consiguen algo más que tragos y atletas.

translation.es: Nada de teléfonos en mi equipo.

We don't do this.

blunts, Mom's Patrón, Lanvers Peak.

Your darling daughter?
Love of your life? Light of your loins?

if we win...

Remember when you were little and you wanted to join the WNBA?

Matt, we need to budget.

translation.es: Sé que nos mudamos aquí por mí, por el trabajo...

Look, I just want you to know that I haven't forgotten

My lucky day.

Real casual-- day drinking, telling dirty jokes.

Open.

that cute cross- country kid with the curly hair?

This.

you turned six, and we all drove down to Stony Creek

translation.es: y les van a mostrar de qué están hechas.

translation.en: the hard, hard gold that pounds in your chests.
translation.es: Del oro más duro que late en sus pechos.

translation.en: You are royalty now. You're gods.
translation.es: Ahora son de la realeza. Son diosas.

translation.en: Make them bow down.
translation.es: Hagan que se inclinen ante ustedes.

translation.en: Do me proud.
- Mmkay. This is it.
Fast, tight, light. Just like in practice.
That means you. Tacy's top.
translation.es: Es decir, tú. Tacy va arriba.

translation.en: - You can't be serious.
You put her up there, she's gonna break her neck. I'm top girl.
translation.es: Si va arriba, se romperá el cuello. La estrella soy yo.

translation.en: - Top girl is a girl who shows, every practice, every game.
translation.es: La estrella es la que viene a todas las prácticas.

translation.en: - I showed. I'm here.
- Top girl is a girl who can control herself.
translation.es: La estrella es la que puede controlarse.

translation.en: - I'm the captain. - We're not doing captains anymore.
translation.es: - Soy la capitana. - Ya no habrá capitana.

translation.en: - No, I'm captain. This is my squad.
It's mine.
My squads don't have captains.
You got this.
Let's go.
crowd:  Eagles! Eagles! Eagles!
- Ambitions and accolades
What did you go do today?
How did you go spend your day?
I work hard, I'm getting paid
- What was I supposed to do?
Let her fall? It was Coach's choice.
- You chose to be her little bitch.
- A diamond in a rhinestone world.
translation.es: Un diamante en un mundo de imitaciones.

translation.en: Coach. - Wow. We pulled it off.
- Oh, more than that.
I was talking to the regionals organizers.
They're interested in letting us host.
- Mm. That'd be great. First round bye.
- Hell yes. Look what you did in just one week.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Mira lo que hiciste en una semana.

translation.en: We're back on the map again.
translation.es: Volvimos a estar en el mapa. Ya no nos verán

translation.en: They'll stop thinking of us as a Rust Belt backwater
translation.es: Volvimos a estar en el mapa. Ya no nos verán como a un pueblo decadente cuando vean el plan del estadio.

translation.en: once they get an eyeful of that stadium plan.
translation.es: como a un pueblo decadente cuando vean el plan del estadio.

translation.en: And we intend to get you
everything you need to lay hands
translation.es: Pretendemos darte lo que necesites para conseguir los anillos del torneo.

translation.en: on those tournament rings.
translation.es: para conseguir los anillos del torneo.

translation.en: -  What he really means
is that we're hitching all our wagons to your star, Coach French.
translation.es: es que queremos beneficiarnos de tu éxito, entrenadora.

translation.en: - No pressure.
Pressure's how diamonds get made.
translation.es: Los diamantes se hacen con presión.

translation.en: - All right, all right, Sutton Grove! - Ow!
- Thank you guys.
So listen. Our football team, huh?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal el equipo de fútbol americano?

translation.en: Got the shit kicked out of them tonight...
translation.es: Les dieron una paliza esta noche.

translation.en: Jeez. Again.
How times have changed. When a lot of us went to school here,
translation.es: Cómo cambiaron los tiempos. Cuando íbamos a la escuela,

translation.en: everything was football, right? We thought it would be that way forever.
translation.es: todo era fútbol, ¿no? Pensamos que siempre sería así.

translation.en: We even had a plan to build a big, gleaming new stadium for our boys.
translation.es: Incluso teníamos un plan para construir un estadio nuevo para nuestros atletas.

translation.en: We had to put that dream on hold. We were struggling.
translation.es: Pero debimos suspender ese sueño por los problemas económicos.

translation.en: All right? Like so many American towns...
felt left behind. But no more.
translation.es: Nos sentimos olvidados, pero nunca más.

translation.en: Tonight, friends-- tonight, we witnessed a transformation.
translation.es: Esta noche, amigos, presenciamos una transformación.

translation.en: We saw how good our girls could be.
translation.es: Vimos lo buenas que son nuestras chicas.

translation.en: We saw that they could take the lead.
translation.es: Vimos que ellas podían tomar la delantera.

translation.en: These girls right here.
Who run the world?
Who run the-- girls!
G-- girls. You've seen the T- shirt. Come on, you guys.
Leaving me hanging up here. Now, listen.
Some people say cheer is not a sport.
translation.es: Algunos dicen que las porristas no son deportistas.

translation.en: I think Coach French over here would disagree,
translation.es: La entrenadora French no debe estar de acuerdo.

translation.en: but I can tell you this:
it is a business.
It's an industry. It's the future.
translation.es: Es una industria. Es el futuro, y es un futuro que llegará a Sutton Grove.

translation.en: And it is a future that is coming here to Sutton Grove.
translation.es: Es el futuro, y es un futuro que llegará a Sutton Grove.

translation.en: Let's hear it! Come on!
Folks, a stadium can transform a town.
translation.es: Un estadio puede transformar un pueblo.

translation.en: A stadium can heal a town.
translation.es: Un estadio puede sanar a un pueblo.

translation.en: If we build this, they will come!
translation.es: Si lo construimos, la prosperidad vendrá.

translation.en: When we have this stadium-- when we have this stadium,
translation.es: Cuando tengamos el estadio, Cuando tengamos el estadio, este faro,

translation.en: this beacon, this lodestar,
translation.es: Cuando tengamos el estadio, este faro, esta Estrella Polar, no habrá nada que no podamos hacer.

translation.en: there is nothing we can't do.
translation.es: esta Estrella Polar, no habrá nada que no podamos hacer.

translation.en: Sutton Grove begins again!
Like a mechanical bull - Wait.
Him. - Then you'll be sorry...
- Him? Why?
- Like a mechanical bull - Why not?
- Hey! Jordy Jones!
- You've been at my throat - Get in!
It's your lucky day.
You've been at my throat - You better have weed.
translation.es: Más te vale que tengas hierba.

translation.en: - Hey. - Hi.
- Hey! Jailbait! Is that my phone?
- Hey. Soldier boy.
What else you got in that car?
- Seriously?
The head push? You're pulling that shit on me?
- I just-- I-- I don't know what you want.
translation.es: Es que no sé lo que quieres.

translation.en: Just...
Make me feel good...
Jordy Jones.
Make me feel...
- You must be Matt.
- Yeah. - I'm J.J. Hi.
Welcome to our nest of vipers.
translation.es: Bienvenido a nuestro nido de víboras. Estarás acostumbrado si trabajas para Bert.

translation.en: But you're probably used to that, working for Bert.
translation.es: Estarás acostumbrado si trabajas para Bert.

translation.en: - Um, no-- no bites yet. -  - But I just started.
translation.es: Aún no me mordieron, pero acabo de empezar.

translation.en: I'm the project manager for the new stadium.
translation.es: Soy el líder de proyecto del nuevo estadio.

translation.en: - I know. I know.
What I don't know is which one of you he had his eyes on first.
translation.es: Lo que no sé es a cuál de ustedes vio primero.

translation.en: - Well, he's had his sights trained on your wife
translation.es: ¿Perdón? Tiene a tu mujer en la mira desde que se llevó a Jeff East.

translation.en: since she took Jeff East to state.
translation.es: Tiene a tu mujer en la mira desde que se llevó a Jeff East.

translation.en: We just never thought we could land her.
Never say Bert Cassidy doesn't know how to sweeten a deal.
translation.es: Bert Cassidy sí que sabe hacer tratos.

translation.en: - Oh, there he is. - Hey.
translation.es: Ahí está. Tenías que entrar a lo grande. Ven aquí.

translation.en: - Oh, had to make a grand entrance, huh?
translation.es: Tenías que entrar a lo grande. Ven aquí.

translation.en: - Guess I missed a lot. - Hey.
- How was, uh-- how was the game?
- Oh, not bad. Uh, Mr. Cassidy has two daughters on the squad--
translation.es: Nada mal. El Sr. Cassidy tiene dos hijas en el equipo.

translation.en: - The little one stole the show.
translation.es: La pequeña se robó el show.

translation.en: People always say to me, Bert, I bet you wish you had sons.
translation.es: La gente siempre me dice: Bert, seguro querías varones.

translation.en: You know what I say to them? Fuck that old news.
translation.es: Les digo: Al carajo con eso.

translation.en: I mean, right? Look at my girls.
Energy, swagger, balls.
- Yes, well, getting any of them to actually work is the hard part.
translation.es: Lograr que trabajaran fue lo más difícil.

translation.en: - All right, that's the--
- It took me a while too. Matt helped me with that.
translation.es: También me llevó tiempo. Matt me ayudó.

translation.en: I don't know where I would be without him.
translation.es: No sé dónde estaría sin él.

translation.en: - Exactly where you are.
Hell, don't be modest.
I didn't realize you followed Colette's career so closely.
translation.es: No sabía que seguías la carrera de Colette tan de cerca.

translation.en: - Oh, I follow winners.
translation.es: No sabía que seguías la carrera de Colette tan de cerca. Sigo a los ganadores. Y luego los compro.

translation.en: And then I buy them.
translation.es: Sigo a los ganadores. Y luego los compro.

translation.en: We've had this date together from the beginning-- all three of us.
translation.es: Tuvimos una cita al principio. Los tres.

translation.en: You look great. It's good to see you. I'm glad you could-- Bill. - Thanks.
translation.es: - Te ves bien. Qué bueno verte. - Gracias

translation.en: - Come over here. I wanted to--
- What the hell, B?
-  - Beth.
Beth!
Put the fucking gun down.
- Listen to your friend.
- What friend?
I had a friend.
Not anymore.
- Beth. Look at me.
- She was my girl.
She was the only one. And she's gone.
translation.es: Era la única y ya no está.

translation.en: - Put the fucking gun down.
Beth, come on.
Beth.
- Everything's bad.
You can't fight it.
- Let's just go, okay? You and me.
Let's go down to the factory and break some windows and go crazy.
translation.es: Vayamos a la fábrica a romper vidrios y a hacer locuras.

translation.en: Okay? You and me.
Put the fucking gun down.
You and me.
- Yeah. - Just you and me.
Like the old days.
Okay?
Please?
- She gonna get into trouble with your coach?
- No.
No one's gonna say anything. I won't let them.
translation.es: Nadie dirá nada. No los dejaré.

translation.en: - Well, she's lucky to have you.
translation.es: Tiene suerte de tenerte a ti.

translation.en: Our coach...
had eyes in the back of his head.
- You played? - Hundred years ago.
Over in Allanville.
Best time of my life.
translation.es: La mejor época de mi vida.

translation.en: Goes by quick, though.
And you never get it back.
I was gonna tell you.
- It turns out you were right.
About the shoes, I mean.
We can't afford them.
- Everything's changing.
You're changing.
- No, I'm not.
- Addy, you're a good person.
You don't know how it works.
People like that, they throw you away.
translation.es: Esa clase de gente te descarta.

translation.en: - People like what?
Go to sleep.
Everything's okay.
- I hope that our memories stay
- You're still my girl, right, Addy?
- Yeah.
- What?
- My phone.
I must have left it up at Lanvers.
- Coach told me something once.
translation.es: La entrenadora me dijo algo una vez.

translation.en: She said,
Someday, you're gonna really want something.
translation.es: ...Algún día vas a querer algo de verdad.

translation.en: That's when you'll find out who you are.
translation.es: En ese momento descubrirás quién eres.

translation.en: - Oh. Got it.
- But there's a price for everything.
You have to give up the old things...
translation.es: Tienes que renunciar a lo viejo.

translation.en: the things that feel easy,
the things that feel safe.
This is how you become strong.
translation.es: Así es como te haces fuerte.

translation.en: This is how you become a woman.
translation.es: Así es como te hacer mujer.

translation.en: Beth!
- Beth! Hey! We're not saying anything.
We're not saying--
-  - We're not saying-- Beth!
In the end...
I couldn't stop it.
Any of it.
